DTField.Name: LOCATION
DTField.Label: LOCATION
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Location reference ID.

DTField.Name: STATUS
DTField.Label: STATUS
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Determines whether the Location is operational (e.g. Yes) or non-operational (e.g. No).

DTField.Name: PUTREGION
DTField.Label: PUTREGION
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Put Region in which the Location is set. This field will be used to set the Putaway logic in the Location.

DTField.Name: PICKREGION
DTField.Label: PICKREGION
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Pick Region in which the Location is set. This field will be used to set the Picking logic from the Location.

DTField.Name: LOCUSAGETYPE
DTField.Label: LOCUSAGETYPE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The form of storage in the Location (e.g. frozen, pallet, etc.).

DTField.Name: LENGTH
DTField.Label: LENGTH
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Location physical info.

DTField.Name: WIDTH
DTField.Label: WIDTH
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Location physical info.

DTField.Name: HEIGHT
DTField.Label: HEIGHT
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Location physical info.

DTField.Name: WEIGHT
DTField.Label: WEIGHT
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Location physical info.

DTField.Name: CUBIC
DTField.Label: CUBIC
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Location physical info.

DTField.Name: LOADSCAPACITY
DTField.Label: LOADSCAPACITY
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The number of Loads that can be stored in the Location.

DTField.Name: AISLE
DTField.Label: AISLE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The aisle in which the Location is found.

DTField.Name: BAY
DTField.Label: BAY
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The bay in which the Location is found.

DTField.Name: CONSIGNEE
DTField.Label: CONSIGNEE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Client whose inventory is stored in the Location.

DTField.Name: SKU
DTField.Label: SKU
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The SKU stored In the Load.

DTField.Name: TotalUnits
DTField.Label: TotalUnits
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The total number of units I the Location.

DTField.Name: TotalVolume
DTField.Label: TotalVolume
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The total volume of the units in the Location.

DTField.Name: TotalWeight
DTField.Label: TotalWeight
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The total weight of the units in the Location.

DTField.Name: NumLoads
DTField.Label: NumLoads
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The number of Loads in the Location.

DTField.Name: NumPendingLoads
DTField.Label: NumPendingLoads
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The number of Loads that are pending to be placed in the Location.

DTField.Name: Pendingunits
DTField.Label: Pendingunits
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The number of Units that are pending to be placed in the Location.

DTField.Name: PendingVolume
DTField.Label: PendingVolume
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The volume of the Loads that are pending to be placed in the Location.

DTField.Name: PendingWeight
DTField.Label: PendingWeight
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The weight of the Loads that are pending to be placed in the Location.

DTField.Name: LocationOccupancy
DTField.Label: LocationOccupancy
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The status of the Location as regarding its occupancy.

DTField.Name: CapacityVolumePCT
DTField.Label: CapacityVolumePCT
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The percentage of the volume of the Location that is still available.

DTField.Name: WAREHOUSEAREA
DTField.Label: WAREHOUSEAREA
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Warehouse Area in which the Location is set. This field will be used to set the Task Assignment logic in the warehouse.
